alert.note: Alert for Harper; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 12:24AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Harper and southern Sumner Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1224 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Harper to near Amorita. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Anthony, Harper, Caldwell, Argonia, Mayfield, Milan, Bluff City, Danville, Waldron, Freeport, and Perth. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 12 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
